scripts.init: npm i && node init.js && dotenv -e .env -- npm run bootstrap -w apps/api && rununtil "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envcli wait-port $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}$:{API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo run generate:directus:types && dotenv -e .env -- npm run post-bootstrap -w apps/api && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo run init" && npm run kill:api && npm run build:clean:force && node post-init.js
scripts.generate:directus:types: rununtil "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo run generate:directus:types" && npm run kill:api
scripts.prod:update: npm ci && dotenv -e .env -- npm run migrate:latest -w apps/api && dotenv -e .env -- npm run schema:import -w apps/api
scripts.build:force: rununtil "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envcli wait-port $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}$:{API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo build --force" && npm run kill:api
scripts.build: rununtil "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envcli wait-port $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}$:{API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo build" && npm run kill:api
scripts.analyze: rununtil "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envcli wait-port $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}$:{API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo analyze" && npm run kill:api
scripts.build:no:check: rununtil "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envcli wait-port $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}$:{API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo build:no:check" && npm run kill:api
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build:zero
scripts.build:clean:force: npm run clean && npm run build:zero:force
scripts.test: rununtil "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envcli wait-port $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}$:{API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo test" && npm run kill:api
scripts.docker:start: concurrently "cd apps/api && docker compose up" "docker compose up"
